## Properties

| Property       | Attribute      | Description                                                                                                      | Type      | Default |
| -------------- | -------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `ishorizontal` | `ishorizontal` | Layout is vertical by default, set ishorizontal to true to change to horizontal layout for desktop Type: boolean | `boolean` | `false` |


## Events

| Event                     | Description                                                       | Type               |
| ------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `elementIsInvisibleEvent` |                                                                   | `CustomEvent<any>` |
| `elementIsVisibleEvent`   | Triggered when the accordion is visible/invisible in the viewport | `CustomEvent<any>` |
